text: Tomáš Došek (born 12 September 1978 in Karlovy Vary) is a former Czech football player who last played for FC Zbrojovka Brno. His twin brother Lukáš plays for FC Thun in the Swiss Super League. They played together at SK Slavia Praha from 1999 to 2004 and also at the international level for the Czech Republic under-21 team and the full national team.BBC Sport - Italy 2–1 Czech Republic (U-21)BBC Sport - Czech Republic 1–0 Italy In 1998, he won the Talent of the Year award at the Czech Footballer of the Year awards.
